mapper.select: SELECT sys_message.message_id, sys_message.mess_date,sys_message.fromUserId, sys_message.toUserId, sys_message.potsId, sys_message.commentId, sys_message.message, sys_message.`type`, sys_message.`status` ,a1.`user_name` AS 'fromName',a2.`user_name` AS 'toName',sys_articles.`articles_title` FROM sys_message INNER JOIN sys_customer AS a1 ON sys_message.`fromUserId`=a1.`userID` INNER JOIN sys_customer AS a2 ON sys_message.`toUserId`=a2.`userID` INNER JOIN sys_articles ON sys_message.`potsId`=sys_articles.`articles_id` INNER JOIN sys_customer ON sys_articles.`user_id` = sys_customer.`userID` WHERE sys_customer.`userID`=#{userID} ORDER BY sys_message.`mess_date` DESC LIMIT #{curr},#{page}
